description: This table holds the claim level secondary information for a non-primary claim.  It contains the paid amount and other secondary amounts other than claim adjustments (CAS).

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CVG_ID
columns.description: The claim-level explanation of benefits coverage ID. This only populates for secondary claims.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_PAID
columns.description: This item holds the claim level paid amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_CONTRACT
columns.description: The claim-level contract amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_PAT_REMAIN
columns.description: This item holds the claim level remaining patient reliability amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_NONCOVERED
columns.description: This item holds the claim level non-covered amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_01
columns.description: This is the covered days count.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_02
columns.description: This is the other coverage monetary amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_03
columns.description: This is the other coverage lifetime psychiatric days count.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_04
columns.description: This is the other coverage Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_05
columns.description: This is the other coverage remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_06
columns.description: This is the other coverage disproportionate share amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_07
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Secondary Payer pass-through amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_08
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System capital amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_09
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System capital federal specific Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_10
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System capital hospital specific Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_11
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System capital Disproportionate Share Hospital Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_12
columns.description: This is the other coverage old capital amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_13
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System capital Indirect Medical Education amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_14
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System operating hospital specific Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_15
columns.description: This is the other coverage cost report day count.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_16
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System federal specific Diagnosis Related Group amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_17
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System capital outlier amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_18
columns.description: This is the other coverage claim indirect teaching amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_19
columns.description: This is the other coverage non-payable professional component billed amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_20
columns.description: This is the other coverage remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_21
columns.description: This is the other coverage remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_22
columns.description: This is the other coverage remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_23
columns.description: This is the other coverage remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MIA_24
columns.description: This is the other coverage Prospective Payment System capital exception amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_01
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication reimbursement rate.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_02
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System payable amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_03
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_04
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_05
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_06
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_07
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication remark code.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_08
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication End Stage Renal Disease payment amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_MOA_09
columns.description: This is the other coverage Medicare Outpatient Adjudication non-payable professional component billed amount.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_DATE
columns.description: The claim-level explanation of benefits adjudication date. This only populates for secondary claims.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_D8
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits (COB) discount amount associated with the claim. This only populates for American National Standards Institute (ANSI) 4010 version electronic claims.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_DY
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits (COB) per day amount associated with the claim. This only populates for American National Standards Institute (ANSI) 4010 version electronic claims.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_F5
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits (COB) patient paid amount associated with the claim. This only populates for American National Standards Institute (ANSI) 4010 version electronic claims.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_T
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits (COB) tax amount associated with the claim. This only populates for American National Standards Institute (ANSI) 4010 version electronic claims.

columns.name: EOB_CLM_AMT_T2
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits (COB) total before taxes amount associated with the claim. This only populates for American National Standards Institute (ANSI) 4010 version electronic claims.

columns.name: EOB_COINS_DAYS
columns.description: This item holds the coinsurance days pulled forward from a valid payment.
